review: This is an amazing little piece of hardware. I highly recommend it.
author: Benyamin C.

review: I couldn't live without my amazon fire tv
author: nikki wood

review: This is great!  We're not very computer or techno savvy but this was VERY EASY TO USE AND ENJOY!  We just love it.  We can switch back and forth with no problem.  It made our dumb TV smart!  It was a wonderful gift!  Thank you!
author: Mary "Mary"

review: I have used Roku's for years but I can honestly say this is better.  The games are great, the picture is clear and the voice recognition is awesome.  I don't have cable and can't think of a reason why I ever would.  The Amazon Fire fits all of my TV needs and has some cute games as well.  I will keep the game system though.  ;)
author: Jennifer "Jennifer"

review: I don't get many of the offerings ever if I have a 30  days free.  WHY???
author: George W Brand
